column3: “Tastes and smells exactly like Orange Juice. Great way to wake up in the morning right before breakfast.”

“Reminds me of a freshly picked tangerine. A sweet and earthy flower. This is smooth on the mind and most kind to the body. Feels like a good day time bud, but it also has made me feel very relaxed. So I could see the benefit of an evening toke and perhaps relief from insomnia.”

“Picked some up from green cross delivery in SF. Love love love this strain!!!! Loaded with a ton of crystals and orange hairs this strain will be sure to give you a great high!!! Smoked a few bowls and I was on cloud 9 !!!”
“Great hybrid strain, very pungent taste and great aroma. Instantly revitalizing, not sour or tangy just right.”

“Great uplifting and great strain to do when times get tough or you just need to get away from reality and be in your own world, but it does dry out your eyes and mouth but that's nothing a Gatorade and eye drops can't fix.”

“I really didn't expect much out of this strain, but actually I was blown away. Reason being because of the Orange juice sweet taste and Orange buds. it made me have a nice head buzz with a relaxed body, definitely good if you have a loss of appetite!”
“This strain is awesome!  fantastic to wake up in the morning an tastes just like orange juice. The strain is good all day you won't want to stop smoking it it tastes that good”
“honestly people....this is better than advertised".

“Orange Juice flowers really do smell like Orange Juice. The Orange Juice smokes as a delicious sweet citrus diesel . The high is just as sweet and relaxing as the smell and taste, so I'm giving this strain 5 stars”
“honestly people....this is better than advertised".
“Nice, Focused High...a little energetic...Nice High 4:20”

“me and my ex smoked it one night and it got us so relaxed that we had sex 6 times without stopping, well except for a cigarette break lol. I loved it but I will never smoke alot of it in one night lol.”
“it's really Great for cleaninG”

“This is Awesome!! Hands up!! Long Day at work Saw on Weedmaps 1 ounce for 60.00 , Very strong orange smell and taste, with heavy diesel overtones, Good sharp crisp high at first afterwards sedated feeling. Not an everyday smoke but evenings it is ON!!”
“Nice relaxed high. Fresh orange peel taste. Nice and mellow, relaxing if you’re just tryna chill. Day or night.”

“I found this slightly underwhelming. I was excited about trying it having heard how unique the taste was, but the orange flavour which came out of my volcano was weak and the vapour thin. The flowers looked decent, smell was meh.

High was an average indica high, didn't last very long and couldn't help put me to sleep.

I would probably not buy this again.”
“very good strain. my favorite orange strain". the smell is very sweet with a suttle smell of orange peels. i expected it to have a more citrus like aroma to it
column4: but the name Orange Juice fits it just right. i would recommend the strain to any consumer that enjoys distinctive buds.”"

column3: “perfect combo for hanging out watching a movie or playing a game/puzzle. chilling happy vibes.”
“Very spicy, and aromatic. Citrus taste on the back-in. Long high, like most kush strains. Highly recommended.”
“Exceptional flavor and aroma, uplifting high 5 stars across the board”
“Ripped my bros fresh new cream bong got fuckin ripped”
“citrusy, gets me relaxed and chill”
“probably one of the best strains I’ve had! Reminds me of back in the day smoking Cali orange! Great relaxed high, really dry mouth and heavy eyes!”
“Minor panic attack on the come up, then I got dizzy and sat down and don't remember anything else (slept for 16 hours straight on the couch, I suffer from SEVERE insomnia).”
“Fantastic strain with an amazing citrusy flavor profile and powerful indica effects.”
“Very sweet, citrusy...smooth high!”
“Dynamite comes in small packages! I love Squib! But people please, don't eat the whole thing at once like a nitwit and ruin it for the rest of us!”

“Was lucky enough to get a lil bit if this live resin in and ooh man it is fantastic. Tastes like orange lemon Pledge but a lil sweeter. The euphoric body high and clear headed stoned make this one of my favorite strains”
“Perfect”
“gg”
